predicate.note: Frames for 're-debate' based on sentences in ebc. No Verbnet entry. Compare to 'debate'.

roleset.name: to discuss or argue about again

example.name: here we go again
example.text: And um you know *PRO* just having [all of this]-1 aired *-1 live and and being debated and re-debated *-1 every statement every comment.
